subject: Basketball
Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: Jason Kidd sliced through a mob of cameras, microphones and bodies, settled into a padded chair and tried to dispel the chaos with a simple three-word introduction: “I’m a Net.”
snippet: Jason Kidd sliced through a mob of cameras, microphones and bodies, settled into a padded chair and tried to dispel the chaos with a simple three-word introduction: “I’m a Net.”
